73b2c17b-9a82-4314-9184-f5a93fa793e8: An exquisite potion of unusual power, brewed by a true virtuoso.
3811e4b7-9721-419e-a8e4-fce18e9d5a60: Elixir of Inconceivable Transmutations of Body, and Soul, and Also Mind
3edfa328-71d1-4584-8762-457a5525bca4: For 1 minute you gain a +8 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability scores{/g} and become immune to mind-affecting effects.
1f88f712-1e6f-4ef8-af2b-33f3e0ce7fa2: For 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} all your {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} have their {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical range{/g} increased by 3.
cae1772a-93a0-4d1d-9468-aead5d055b78: For 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} you become {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Immunity}immune{/g} to acid. For the duration, whenever you make a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attack{/g}, it deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}6d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}acid damage{/g} to every enemy within 30 feet radius ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} 30 {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex saving throw{/g} to halve the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}).
b2cccd39-03d6-40ff-884a-33348a4ecd81: For 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} you gain a +6 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability scores{/g}, a +5 bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} and a +5 bonus on all {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}. You also gain hardness 10 (works identical to {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 10/-, except it stacks with any other DR you might have). When this effect ends, you must make a successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saving throw{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} 25) or become {g|ConditionStunned}stunned{/g} for 1 round.
4d9c8031-9194-46f9-bf2d-d483d700bc11: For 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}, you gain {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} N/-, where N is equal to your {g|Encyclopedia:Character_Level}character level{/g}.
cf2ea8fb-99db-49e5-b8e5-95d6701fe07a: For 5 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} all your {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} have their {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical{/g} multiplier increased by 1.
ab355ba7-132b-4ce6-91c4-047dea8ced64: For 5 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} all your {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attacks{/g} deal double {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}, but each round you take {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d8{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g}.
fa0f3393-a14e-4bfa-9dcf-5c03c68b1f04: For 5 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} you gain 25 temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g}, but each of these rounds you receive {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}. Whenever you receive damage from any source while under this effect, you gain 1 mind bomb charge. When the duration of this effect ends, you lose all mind bomb charges, and send an energy wave dealing all creatures in 30 feet range 1d8 {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}force damage{/g} per charge spent.
084157e4-7f88-40b5-8865-c9cd54310a67: For 5 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}, each time your {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} misses, you gain a stacking +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all attack rolls until the end of this effect.
008ecfa6-388a-4fd5-8b27-d086cee8966d: For one minute you are protected from {g|Encyclopedia:Injury_Death}death{/g}. If you die under this effect, you immediately come back to life with 50 {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g}.
5a146efe-28b7-4efa-9a94-36c7c09b46e4: This potion can protect you from fire by absorbing first 36 {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g}.
77f56bbb-f50c-4c81-bdc0-7808944735c8: This potion restores all your {g|Encyclopedia:HP}HP{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:AbilityDamage}ability damage{/g} and ability drain. It also dispels all magic effects giving you {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability scores{/g}, neutralizes all diseases and poisons, removes {g|ConditionFatigued}fatigue{/g} and {g|ConditionExhausted}exhaustion{/g}, as well as insanity, {g|ConditionConfusion}confusion{/g} and other mind-affecting effects.
ccd8a471-5ed0-40b7-bd27-57641347206e: Transmutation of Mind, Body and Soul
a3e17de3-eeb8-47c7-ac47-7fc7fe1d03db: Two next {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} you land will result in {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hits{/g}. Until these attacks are made, you gain a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}.
723e5187-e8a6-4e6d-bc8f-5304a2113c35: Until the end of combat, you gain 5 temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HP}HP{/g} per your {g|Encyclopedia:Character_Level}character level{/g}.
bd2b8d2a-856f-40bc-bf55-c3045a5a557c: Whoever drinks this elixir will permanently gain a +2 inherent {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability scores{/g}.
30d4ac43-f9d9-445c-aae9-f07e3a39f1f9: You become immune to all {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}. After that you receive {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}10d10{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}negative energy damage{/g} (a successful {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} 35 {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saving throw{/g} halves the damage).
1fe54dd0-1086-4317-8dda-c9fd5410ba65: You gain a +2 alchemical {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability scores{/g}.
93c8ada4-71c5-4d65-a844-0e030be32c7f: You gain a +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}, and every {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throw{/g} you make automatically succeeds. This effect lasts for 1 minute, or until you've made 3 saving throws.
